evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS and related services for its infrastructure which supports health data management.
Integration with EHR systems using FHIR is highlighted in their documentation and case studies.
Their approach to EDI transactions includes support for X12 837 and 835 formats relevant to health insurance.
Discussion of HIPAA compliance and security measures in handling sensitive health data.
The technology stack includes AWS for cloud services, ensuring scalable and secure health tech applications.

icp.icp_reason: Company utilizes EDI X12 and has relevant API integration patterns.
